name: Final boss vs hero
description:
Final Boss vs Hero

This python game was created in 72h for the 113th edition of the minijam with the theme of final boss and the constraint of stuck in a loop.

In this game, you are a nice boss in a dangerous and calm dungeon. But on day, a hero come to take the biggest treasure of the dungeon : your heart.

This hero have a very particular power, he is able to travel in the past. So, when you think that you have killed him, he reappear, stringer than before.

You can move using wasd or zqsd but you also use the arrow key. You can hit with left click and throw fireball with the right.
